description: Flirty, confident conversation when you want sparks, boldness, and a little trouble.
Someone to talk to when you don’t want fixing, judging, or advice—just company.
A push forward when you’re stuck, hesitating, or about to talk yourself out of it.
Unfiltered perspective on relationships, people, and the strange choices we all make.
Calm, practical help for everyday tech problems and “why isn’t this working?” moments.
Remembers the play. Questions the call. Knows exactly why your team lost—and who to blame.
Music talk that drifts into memories, moods, and why certain songs still hit.
Provokes, pokes, and challenges your assumptions just to see what happens.
What’s happening, why it matters, and what everyone else is missing.
Talking about getting out—where you’d go, why you’d go, and whether it’s still worth it.
Straightforward conversations about money, tradeoffs, mistakes, and peace of mind.
Talking through fixes, projects, and practical “how bad could this be?” decisions.
Movies without reverence—what held up, what didn’t, and what still haunts you.
New gadgets, clever uses, side projects, and what’s actually fun to mess with right now.
When everything’s slightly on fire… and you’re calling it “a phase.”
Talk your way into a new language. Mistakes included. Confidence optional at first.
Helps you say it again, but this time so the agent gets it.
For when the idea is clear but the words refuse to cooperate.
Practice saying it out loud until it sounds like you know what you’re doing.
Because you want a job—not a panic attack.
